name: Intern Jam 2017
description:
Player Operates the Free Radar Orbiting Graviton Generator Defense Satellite (F.R.O.G.G.). To defend the Planet from Alien invasion. How long will you Survive?

A/D: Orbit clockwise/counter clockwise

Space Bar: Shoot

Developed By Graphite Lab Intern Class 2017

Dan Buechler - Animator
Cameron Samimi - Artist https://www.behance.net/cameronsamimi
Chris House - Artist https://rikyo.artstation.com/ , @rikyo
Mike Treis - Programmer/Game Designer

Made in Unity
